scripts.dev: npm run dev1 & npm run dev2
scripts.build:win32: set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 && vitepress build docs/main && vitepress build docs/andexdb
scripts.build:darwin:linux: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 && vitepress build docs/main && vitepress build docs/andexdb
scripts.fastbuild:win32: set FAST_BUILD=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && vitepress build docs/main && vitepress build docs/andexdb
scripts.fastbuild:darwin:linux: export FAST_BUILD=true && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && vitepress build docs/main && vitepress build docs/andexdb
scripts.preview: vitepress preview docs/main && vitepress preview docs/andexdb
